subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In hopes of reforming a scandal-plagued industry worth hundreds of millions of dollars for the state, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will create a new board to replace the New York Racing Association.
snippet: In hopes of reforming a scandal-plagued industry worth hundreds of millions of dollars for the state, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo will create a new board to replace the New York Racing Association.
